thread.title: Plastic Wrap Makes Food Processor Cleanup a Snap
thread.title_full: Plastic Wrap Makes Food Processor Cleanup a Snap

author: Sho Spaeth
title: Plastic Wrap Makes Food Processor Cleanup a Snap
text: Even the most efficient kitchen appliances can be flawed, regardless of whether they do their intended job. From box graters to food mills to the ubiquitous food processor, some appliances are infuriatingly difficult to clean. But with just a sheet of plastic wrap, you can say good-bye to dirty food processor lids for good. Here's how. Read More
